content:
# I have successfully extracted 8 iron plates from the stone furnace. My updated inventory now reflects:
# - 2 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 8 stones
# - 5 copper ore
# - 8 iron plates
# - 2 iron gear wheels
# - 2 electronic circuits

# The stone furnace is currently idle with 28 units of coal and no ingredients left to smelt.

# Now that I have:
# - 2 iron gear wheels
# - 2 electronic circuits
# - 2 transport belts
# - 8 iron plates

# I can proceed to craft an Assembling Machine. The requirements are:
# - 1 electronic circuit
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 1 transport belt

# I have enough components to craft one Assembling Machine. Let's craft it now.

craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1)  # Craft 1 Assembling Machine using the correct prototype.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting the Assembling Machine. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
